title: "Intro to ggplot2"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
Births78 <- read.csv("https://github.com/cmsc205/data/raw/master/Birth78.csv")
head(Births78)
```

```{r}
Births78$date <- as_date(Births78$date)
head(Births78)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data=Births78, aes(x=date, y=births)) + 
  geom_point()
```


# Your first histogram in CMSC 205

```{r}
# Goal: histogram of the births
# R needs to know: x = births
Births78 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = births)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=100, fill = "steelblue", color = "gray90")
```

# Your first bar chart in CMSC 205

```{r}
# Goal: bar chart of wday
# R needs to know: x = wday
Births78 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=wday)) +
  geom_bar()
```
